Cedant: The New India Assurance Co. Ltd.
Perils_Covered: Flood, Cloud Burst, Fire, Explosion, Earthquake, Landslides, Terrorist Threats, Sabotage, Bomb Threat, Disruption in Power Supply, Leakage in Power House and other underground structures, Machinery Breakdown
Main_Activities: Package-6, Modification of Diversion Tunnel into Tunnel Spillway Arrangement - Civil & HM Works (Tunnel Spillway, Adit to GOC, GOC Gate Shaft, Inlet Bellmouth, Outlet Concrete Dyke and Energy Dissipation Arrangement) for Teesta-V Power Station
Proposed_Terms_Conditions: Annual maintenance, routine pre/post-monsoon inspections, Emergency Action Plan (EAP) in place (issued Feb 2019), inundation maps updated, annual mock drills, dam designed for PMF of 9500 cumecs (revised to 14596 cumec), seismic design parameters (Horizontal PGA 0.16g, Vertical PGA 0.32g), dedicated dewatering pumps of adequate capacity, silt content monitoring and machine shutdown if silt exceeds 5000 PPM, comprehensive fire protection systems (smoke/heat detectors, deluge systems, fire water headers, hydrants, extinguishers), critical spares inventory, CISF personnel for security, regular testing of seepage water for reactive/corrosive properties.
